item.title: About
item.description: Bio I completed my undergraduate studies in mechanical engineering in 2021. I graduated with a Bachelor of Engineering (B.Eng.) from Ramaiah Institute of Technology, Bangalore.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Here are some links to my projects: crazypaths: A command-line interface (CLI) for path planning quadrotor trajectories using motion capture positioning in the high-level control loop.

item.title: Research
item.description: Background In Fall 2018, during my undergraduate studies, I attended a seminar which dissected the working of commonly used flight controllers on aerial vehicles.
